title: !!!WAYKURAT!!! Civ IV + Warlords Exp Cracks Leopard 10.5.2 [MAC]
description:
Hi!

Here's a compilation i made to make Civilizations IV work on Leopard 10.5.2

Some people i think are having problems so i hope this would make their jobs easier.

This is my first upload so please bear with me. Constructive criticism and other comments are very much welcome. Otherwise, please don't bother to add incendiary comments. Or else i might just stop trying to help out altogether.

Just unzip the file and place the cracks on the directory you installed Civilizations for and the Expansion. Then run each crack starting with Civilization IV NODVD - point it to the Civilization IV.app file, then Civilizations IV 1.61 - point it to the same file, then Civilization IV Warlords and point it to the Civilization IV Warlords.app file.

Again, comments are all welcome.

I owe a lot greatly to the file uploaded by kijulama here: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3872926/Civilization_IV_for_MAC__universal" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3872926/Civilization_IV_for_MAC__universal</a>

It's one hell of a superb game.

Kudos also to the members who made various comments and instructions to help people out, including me.

Ciao!
